price: Sai Muka yi azãbar rãmuwa, daga gare su, sabõda haka Muka nutsar da su a cikin tẽku, dõmin lalle ne sũ, sun ƙaryata game da ãyõyinMu, kuma sun kasance daga barinsu, gãfilai.
arabic: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَكَانُواْ عَنۡهَا غَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-intaqamnā min'hum fa-aghraqnāhum fī al-yami bi-annahum kadhabū biāyātinā wakānū ʿanhā ghāfilīna
